en-US.summary: OpenEyes Survey skill is for gathering user feedback and conducting market research in a quick and novel way.
en-US.name: Openeyes Survey
en-US.description: OpenEyes Survey skill is for gathering user feedback and conducting market research. It supports 5 different question formats that are commonly used for gathering user responses and feedback. Once the survey is created on the web application, users can take the survey via OpenEyes Survey skill. Skill is designed to be a quick and novel way to get feedback. Apart from standard Alexa features, it has custom options to help user during the survey.
en-US.updatesDescription: - Cancel report functionality : Code changes in Amazon.CancelIntent Handler
